remarks: Another way to express the value of the preimage mapping operator (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jan-2017.)
statement:
orvcval.1 $e |- ( ph -> Fun X ) $.
orvcval.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
orvcval.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. W ) $.
orvcval2 $p |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC R A ) = { z e. dom X | ( X ` z ) R A } ) $.
$d A z $.
$d R z $.
$d X z $.
